Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.objects.environment

Class Sensor<T>

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.objects.environment.Sensor<T>
public class Sensor<T> extends Object
An environment sensor used to return values or objects which have been configured for specific areas. Currently, solely used by mosaic-application in combination with mosaic-environment. In mosaic-environment, certain events are configured in areas. The type of the event corresponds to one of the provided sensors (or custom implementations of Sensor), identified by the name of the sensor. The value that is applied is taken from the same configuration in mosaic-environment, and can then be "sensed" by the provided Sensor in the application of the simulation unit.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Sensor<EnvironmentEventCause>
    EVENT
    A sensor that senses hazardous events of a specific EnvironmentEventCause.
    static final Sensor<Double>
    ROAD_SURFACE_CONDITION
    A sensor that senses the condition of the road-surface (e.g., IRI).
    static final Sensor<Double>
    TEMPERATURE
    A sensor that senses a specific "TEMPERATURE" in an area, with user-defined temperature (double).
    static final Sensor<TractionHazard>
    TRACTION_HAZARD
    A sensor that senses a hazard regarding vehicle traction, caused by icy roads, aqua planning, snow or mud.
    static final Sensor<VisibilityHazard>
    VISIBILITY_HAZARD
    A sensor that senses a hazard resulting in reduced visibility, caused by rain, snow, fog, or dust.
    static final Sensor<Wind>
    WIND
    A sensor that senses properties of wind (direction and wind speed), not including airflow experienced from driving.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sensor

      public Sensor(String name, Function<Object,T> translator)
      Creates a new custom Sensor. This is usually only required, if the pre-defined sensors are not sufficient, but can be used to extend the types of events supported by the Environment Sensor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this sensor, must correspond to the event types configured in mosaic-environment.
      translator - a function to translate any object to the required type T

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public final String getName()
      Returns the name of this sensor.

    • translate

      public T translate(Object value)
      Translates an object (e.g., which configured in the environment_config.json) to the actual value and correct type of this Sensor. The input object is most likely to be a primitive type, such as Boolean, Integer, Long, Double, or String.
      Parameters:
      value - the input value of unknown type
      Returns:
      the input value translated to the parametrized type T of this Sensor
